title: Paranormal Voices
description: INTRODUCING "CHAINED" BY J.M. TRESAUGUE!Have unexplained happenings caused you to wonder if there is a definitive line between reality as we know it, and a world of shadows and voices from beyond? Or is the line so blurred that a person could unknowingly venture from one side to the other? It has been said that such transferences can be the result of a simple error in judgment, a chance meeting with a stranger, or a blind misstep in the dark.'Paranormal Voices' is a journey into a mysterious world where anything can happen and often does. Three mind bending tales: The Back Lot, Disturbed, and Chained. Not for the faint of heart.
author: Peggy Randall-Martin
